text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Goodbye October, Hello November. Did you remember to turn your clocks back last night? Many people don’t like that the early evening hours will be darker now. I am not one of them as I love the cozy homey feel the time change provides for the dinner hour. I will put my kitchen counter lamp on (open in same tab) and play some relaxing tunes while I prepare dinner and I am in a happy place. In about two weeks I will start listening to my favorite Christmas music when it gets dark which will make the dinner hour feel even more magical. How about you? Do you like when it gets dark earlier now that the clocks went back an hour? Posts You May Have Missed This Week: What’s up with my House & Life updates. (open in same tab) If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

Goodbye October, Hello November. Did you remember to turn your clocks back last night? Many people don’t like that the early evening hours will be darker now. I am not one of them as I love the cozy homey feel the time change provides for the dinner hour.

I will put my kitchen counter lamp on (open in same tab) and play some relaxing tunes while I prepare dinner and I am in a happy place. In about two weeks I will start listening to my favorite Christmas music when it gets dark which will make the dinner hour feel even more magical.

How about you? Do you like when it gets dark earlier now that the clocks went back an hour?

Posts You May Have Missed This Week:

  • What’s up with my House & Life updates. (open in same tab)

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
